page.title: Wanadoo Teams with Loudeye to Extend Music Service
page.text: PARIS (Reuters) - Wanadoo has signed a deal with U.S.-based digital media firm Loudeye <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=LOUD.O qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">LOUD.O</A> to bring its online music service to subscribers in the Netherlands and Spain, the Internet division of France Telecom <A HREF="http://www.reuters.co.uk/financeQuoteLookup.jhtml?ticker=FTE.PA qtype=sym infotype=info qcat=news">FTE.PA</A> said on Tuesday.
